name: Torchbox
tagline: We do digital for the good guys.
description:
Torchbox is a multi award-winning digital agency which specialises in building powerful websites and custom web apps for the world's leading non-profits, charities, universities and museums.
In 2016, Torchbox received a lot of industry attention, picking up eight awards for it's work with University of Oxford, Museum of London, Africa Progress Panel and Royal College of Nursing.
Torchbox was also recognised as a top digital agency, achieving Elite Agency status in The Drum's Digital Census, and ranking third in the Wirehive 100 (list of the best agencies in the South of England).
